response.overview: As 13-year-old Myron himself puts it, his movie is “a triumph of innovative filmmaking, the story of an honest man (himself) trapped in a family of hypocritical liars gathered together for the funeral of an uncle they all despised.”Which is why he has wired his mother’s house with spy camera to make a “home movie” that will force his family to face the truth. But the truth, as Myron finds out, can not only turn around and face you but bite you as well.
response.title: Myron's Movie
